channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Live: WA World Championship Athletics
channel.desc: Coverage continues of the first evening session of the 2025 World Athletics Championships as three gold medals are handed out. Ethiopia's Gudaf Tsegay is back to defend her 10,000m crown, and despite missing much of the season though injury, Ryan Crouser has confirmed he will be in Tokyo and aiming to win the men's shot put for the third time in a row.
